info.name: Reddit's Classic Colors for both Voat and reddit
info.description: Adds the Classic Reddit-styled colors to the (+x|-x) symbols, as well as to the post and comment score.
info.additionalInfo:
April 5th, 2016 (16:04 CDT): Update: This actually works with reddit as well, except it only colors the amount of points a comment has.
April 5th, 2016 (16:06 CDT): Updated the photo examples, as well as the title.
